Posts.Content: JSB wrote: I thought my period would stop after 1st round of chemo but it did not. I am 3+ estrogen positive and high risk for recurrance from my Oncotype DX result of 34. I asked my doctor about  a ovary suppression shot due to research article I found from Austria that showed a lower recurrance rate when the period was suppressed with chemo vs. those whose periods were not suppressed during chemo. My doctor said said no to the shot. He said our original decision to remove ovaries after my bilateral mastectomy would be find. I'm still not happy with estrogen circulating around the body and not happy with my doctors response. I would appreciate any thoughts on this subject. Dx 9/8/2009, IDC, 2cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Chemo and period not stopping JSB Scoobydoo

Posts.Content: Nov 24, 2009 04:56PM JSB wrote: thank you so much for your reply! It helps so much to hear from someone who is going through the same thing!
Posts.Title: Chemo and period not stopping JSB Scoobydoo
